sentences: On 18 May, Chair Asadi reported on a meeting during SB 26 of the SBSTA and SBI Chairs, Executive Secretary Yvo de Boer and Chairs of the Convention's expert groups the CGE, Expert Group on Technology Transfer (EGTT), and LDC Expert Group.
Chair Asadi noted that the meeting aimed to exchange information, and encourage cooperation and collaboration, for instance on the Nairobi Work Programme on Impacts, Vulnerability and Adaptation.
He said that there was now a good practice of cooperation among these groups, and expressed the hope that it would continue and even be enhanced in the coming years.
enb_long_title: Twenty-sixth sessions of the Subsidiary Bodies (SB 26) of the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change (UNFCCC)
